title: Reset your Tenzu password
subtitle: Enter your email and we will send you a reset link.

token_error.used-reset-password-token-error: The token has already been used

confirm.title: Check your inbox
confirm.subtitle: If there is an account associated with this email address you will receive an email with instructions to reset your password to:
confirm.new_email: Want to use a different email?

expired_invitation.title: Your reset link has expired.
expired_invitation.description: Please enter your email address and we will send you a new reset link to your inbox.
